TopicTitle: Top Gun AI - The Official Tournament Thread

Articles.Content: Ok then, time limit of ten minutes.
I can agree to a 10 minute time limit for fuel or match time, whichever comes first.

Erm, I'd want to add fuel to meet a 10 minute flight time. I think I was conservative anyway and they should manage (Wheesleys for sure), but would like the option to change that. All rule changes that alter design balance should really be left to the next contest.
The time limit of ten minutes could be raised to 15.but imagine 45 minutes of this...NEVERMIND, no time limits. Nothing crazy is likely to happen anyway.

I made a lighter version of my plane (trimmed the fat, dumped the draggy weapons and draggier parts). I'll submit it when I tweak it.

We gotta get some of the parts checked for aerodynamic drag. There is no way that a rocket pod should have the same drag as a 1 x 1 flat plate stuck to the nose and I'm pushing it full on.

I'm not kidding. With two rocket pods my top speed was 392 m/s at 200 m ASL. I dumped the pods and my speed shot up to 432 m/s.

Here's my second entry: the **SlamTek Spatha 1-A** ([download link](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_FjXR8JXRQZa2NuS05NeG53d2c/view?usp=sharing))

![N0zn70d.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/N0zn70d.jpg)

2x RamJet

1x ECM Jammer

5x Flares

2x Vulcan 20mm

2x 20mm Ammo

59 points

[Here is a new version of the Gladius](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_FjXR8JXRQZb3RoMzhKek9CSHc/view?usp=sharing), as well. No part changes: only a couple settings have been changed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-16T04:24:05Z" title="08/16/2015 04:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 16, 2015</time> by Slam\_Jones**

Nice plane Slam\_Jones! Like the look!

I gave my previous plane entry a serious diet, dropped nearly 3 1/2 tonnes, removed some draggy parts.......

![screenshot22_3.png](http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e216/Max_Payne_0001/screenshot22_3.png)

This is Typhoeus MK1.

[http://www.filehosting.org/file/details/503633/Typhoeus%20MK1.craft](http://www.filehosting.org/file/details/503633/Typhoeus%20MK1.craft)

2X hidden Vulcans

4X 20mm boxes of ammo

2x AIM-9 sidewinders

2X AIM-120

2X Chaff

2X Flares

Total: 60 points.

She's lean, light, quick, and ready to do 10G turns. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I suppose if you are doing it, I will to. New plane out tomorrow.
Looking forward to seeing that Alphasus!
OK guys, I've been really busy so I won't be entering the tournament, but can someone give me a list of all the points for the new items so I can add it to the OP?

I've just realised how to turn the jammer on. I'm a nonce - I thought the blasted thing didn't work!

Edit: I think BDA 0.9.5 fixed it.

Edit2: Now I'm confused. It works on some planes but not others?

Nothing else actually assists in combat the way we fight.
Well, I had a plane ready but then I deleted My ksp Folder on accident... so, I got to make a new one. :/
I'm thoroughly confused by the jammers, some days they're invisible, others they're worthless. I have no idea what's going on.
I want to submit another plane, is that ok?

> 
> I want to submit another plane, is that ok?

yes it is, I am too.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I'm thoroughly confused by the jammers, some days they're invisible, others they're worthless. I have no idea what's going on.

If you are too close to another plane its radar burns through the jammer.

Ok, another plane

![5AM2vAx.png](http://i.imgur.com/5AM2vAx.png)

MIT-1

1x GAU-8 14 points

2x 30mm ammo box 8 points

2x chaff 4 points

2x flare 6 points

4x AIM-120 16 points

2x AIM-9 12 points

Total: 60 points

Download link: [https://www./?rnpn5x73ve38yyu](https://www./?rnpn5x73ve38yyu)

Message me if there is any violation of the rule

Thank you very much. Now, for my second entry. I present to you, the FA-33 GoldenHawk(yes, i did go through 6 different iterations between this and the FA-27, they were all failures).

Link to album here:[http://imgur.com/a/1fcA1#0](http://imgur.com/a/1fcA1#0)

![2EsUX2A.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2EsUX2A.jpg)

The FA-33 GoldenHawk is a single-engined, 8.8 ton interceptor.

It carries:

2 AIM-9 "Sidewinder" Missiles-12 points

6 Chaff Anti-Radar Seeker Countermeasures-12 points

6 Flare Anti-Heat Seeker Countermeasures-18 points

1 Vulcan 20 mm Cannon-7 points

2 20 mm Ammo Boxes- 8 points

This bird will see you on the ground!

Download link:[http://www./download/6ljokp7gmnuul99/FA-33_GoldenHawk.craft](http://www./download/6ljokp7gmnuul99/FA-33_GoldenHawk.craft)

> 
> yes it is, I am too.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> If you are too close to another plane its radar burns through the jammer.

That must be it. I've posted on the discussion thread about the use of ground radar to create more tactical contests.
By too close I mean within 10 km. You need multiple jammers otherwise,then that range decreases and it becomes more consistent.

Umm, jammer is 20 points. I will likely lower it to 14, and you will just squeeze in.(Not because of him, jammers are inconsistent,but more consistent than 4 flares, less so than 5.)

8 flares= 24

1 jammer=15

2 20mm=14

2 ammo cans=8

All of my designs look cool and work okay, but the turning...

The freaking turning...

It's not slow, but it lags...

A lot.
how many parts are they?
The most successful one is I think 31 parts in total, and hits at 58 points. It doesn't really "turn", it enters a "controlled stall".
interesting...
